@gumballmachine I didn't. After that shit, it's beers with friends just to forget it, and even a trip to Japan which got me hooked to animes and mangas. And then a year later here I am, with a crippling netorare addiction. And it ain't as bad as I told you by the way. My nigga might have not follow the bro code, but the last girl she introduced me with ended up becoming my girl for like 2 months.

Also this mc isn't as pathetic as you make him out to be, he got emotionally jolted from how it all went down, first his friend sets him up with the wrong girl thinking she was his target then his crush despite flirting with him, ends up being a slut and doing the friend and when he was down with fucking the black haired girl after finding her attractive when they were playing, SHE ends up being the cuck and going after her crush despite him just fucking and nutting inside her best friend, like... imagine YOU (if a guy) fucking your crush after she got fucked and creampied, that'd be very beta imo

They're not trying to market to people who want a revenge ntr, most artists have their niche and stick by it. Osea las chicas  en la mayoría de mangas de este autor pierden su virginidad con cualquier otro solo porque no el MC no tiene el valor de hacer avance, pero en vez de  que ellas hagan el avance van a perder la virginidad con otro enfrente del chico que les gusta por enojo o capricho.
